articles.author: Mike Stobbe
articles.title: More than 120,000 US kids had caregivers die during pandemic - Associated Press
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — The number of U.S. children orphaned during the COVID-19 pandemic may be larger than previously estimated, and the toll has been far greater among Black and Hispanic Americans, a new study suggests.
articles.content: NEW YORK (AP) The number of U.S. children orphaned during the COVID-19 pandemic may be larger than previously estimated, and the toll has been far greater among Black and Hispanic Americans, a new st… [+3600 chars]

articles.title: Tyson Fury v Deontay Wilder III: Briton tells American rival 'your legacy is in bits' - BBC Sport
articles.description: Tyson Fury goads Deontay Wilder into a shouting match at the final news conference before their latest meeting, telling his rival to "retire".
articles.content:
